entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 18 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low zero with temperature rising to 6 by morning.
